---
description: A Card component.
---

A basic UI card component for a unified Card UI in the Acme platform.

## Get started

Install and use the component in your code:

```js
<Card>Hello world!</Card>
```

### Use a custom class name

You can use a custom class name using the `className` prop:

```js
import styles from './card.module.scss';

<Card className={styles.card}>
  Hello world!
</Card>
```
